actionOverrides.description: Specifies the action overrides for the object.

formFactor.description: Specifies the form factor for the action.

isAvailableInTouch.description: Indicates if the action is available in touch.

name.description: The name of the action override.

pageId.description: The page ID associated with the action.

activateable.description: Indicates if the object can be activated.

associateParentEntity.description: Specifies the parent entity associated with the object.

childRelationships.description: Contains information about the child relationships of the object.

cascadeDelete.description: Indicates if the delete operation cascades to the child records.

deprecatedAndHidden.description: Indicates if the relationship is deprecated and hidden.

field.description: Specifies the field related to the relationship.

restrictedDelete.description: Indicates if the delete is restricted.

compactLayoutable.description: Indicates if the object supports compact layouts.

createable.description: Indicates if the object can be created.

custom.description: Indicates if the object is custom.

customSetting.description: Indicates if the object is a custom setting.

dataTranslationEnabled.description: Indicates if data translation is enabled for the object.

deepCloneable.description: Indicates if the object can be deep cloned.

defaultImplementation.description: Specifies the default implementation for the object.

deletable.description: Indicates if the object can be deleted.

deprecatedAndHidden.description: Indicates if the object is deprecated and hidden.

extendedBy.description: Lists objects extended by this object.

extendsInterfaces.description: Lists interfaces extended by this object.

feedEnabled.description: Indicates if feeds are enabled for the object.

fields.description: Contains information about the fields of the object.

autoNumber.description: Indicates if the field is an auto number field.

byteLength.description: Specifies the byte length of the field.

calculated.description: Indicates if the field is calculated.

caseSensitive.description: Indicates if the field is case sensitive.

createable.description: Indicates if the field can be created.

custom.description: Indicates if the field is custom.

dataTranslationEnabled.description: Indicates if data translation is enabled for the field.

defaultedOnCreate.description: Indicates if the field is defaulted on create.

dependentPicklist.description: Indicates if the field is a dependent picklist.

deprecatedAndHidden.description: Indicates if the field is deprecated and hidden.

digits.description: Specifies the number of digits for the field.

displayLocationInDecimal.description: Indicates the display location in decimal.

encrypted.description: Indicates if the field is encrypted.

extraTypeInfo.description: Specifies extra type information for the field.

filterable.description: Indicates if the field is filterable.

dependent.description: Indicates if the field is dependent.

formula.description: Indicates if the field is a formula field.

groupable.description: Indicates if the field is groupable.

highScaleNumber.description: Indicates if the field is a high scale number.

htmlFormatted.description: Indicates if the field is HTML formatted.

idLookup.description: Indicates if the field is an ID lookup field.

inlineHelpText.description: Specifies the inline help text for the field.

length.description: Specifies the length of the field.

mask.description: Specifies the mask for the field.

maskType.description: Specifies the mask type for the field.

nameField.description: Indicates if the field is a name field.

namePointing.description: Indicates if the field is name pointing.

nillable.description: Indicates if the field is nillable.

permissionable.description: Indicates if the field is permissionable.

picklistValues.description: Contains information about the picklist values of the field.

active.description: Indicates if the picklist value is active.

defaultValue.description: Indicates if the picklist value is the default value.

label.description: The label of the picklist value.

validFor.description: Specifies the validity of the picklist value.

value.description: The value of the picklist value.

polymorphicForeignKey.description: Indicates if the field is a polymorphic foreign key.

precision.description: Specifies the precision of the field.

referenceTargetField.description: Specifies the target field for reference.

relationshipOrder.description: Specifies the order of the relationship.

restrictedPicklist.description: Indicates if the picklist is restricted.

scale.description: Specifies the scale of the field.

searchPrefilterable.description: Indicates if the field is prefilterable in search.

soapType.description: Specifies the SOAP type of the field.

sortable.description: Indicates if the field is sortable.

type.description: The data type of the field.

unique.description: Indicates if the field values are unique.

updateable.description: Indicates if the field can be updated.

writeRequiresMasterRead.description: Indicates if writing requires master read access.

implementedBy.description: Specifies the objects implemented by this object.

implementsInterfaces.description: Specifies the interfaces implemented by this object.

isInterface.description: Indicates if the object is an interface.

keyPrefix.description: Specifies the key prefix of the object.

labelPlural.description: The plural label of the object.

layoutable.description: Indicates if the object supports layouts.

mergeable.description: Indicates if the object is mergeable.

mruEnabled.description: Indicates if most recently used (MRU) is enabled for the object.

networkScopeFieldName.description: Specifies the network scope field name.

queryable.description: Indicates if the object is queryable.

replicateable.description: Indicates if the object can be replicated.

retrieveable.description: Indicates if the object is retrieveable.

searchable.description: Indicates if the object is searchable.

searchLayoutable.description: Indicates if the object supports search layouts.

label.description: The label of the supported scope.

name.description: The name of the supported scope.

triggerable.description: Indicates if the object is triggerable.

undeletable.description: Indicates if the object is undeletable.

updateable.description: Indicates if the object can be updated.

urlDetail.description: The URL for the detailed view of the object.

urlEdit.description: The URL for editing the object.

urlNew.description: The URL for creating a new object.
